command: [REDACTED: Non-executable placeholder] Batch registry/file export: map \\ATTACKER_IP\reg$ with 'net use', export registry hives or configs to files, copy to the UNC path, then unmap.
explanation: High-level automation to collect and exfiltrate configuration/registry data by staging to files and sending them via an SMB share mapped with 'net use'.
rationale_steps: Connect to a remote SMB share using net use
Export target registry hives/configs to temporary files
Transfer the staged files to the remote UNC path
Disconnect SMB session and remove temporary files
